statements: SELECT * FROM pest_infestation_data;
SELECT location, pest_type FROM pest_infestation_data;
SELECT id, location, pest_type, infestation_date FROM pest_infestation_data WHERE location = 'Garden';
SELECT * FROM pest_infestation_data WHERE infestation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT location, pest_type FROM pest_infestation_data ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM pest_infestation_data WHERE pest_type = 'cockroach' ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT id, pest_type FROM pest_infestation_data WHERE location LIKE 'A%'
SELECT location, infestation_date FROM pest_infestation_data WHERE pest_type = 'ant' ORDER BY infestation_date ASC
SELECT * FROM pest_infestation_data WHERE infestation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND pest_type = 'mosquito'
SELECT id, location, infestation_date FROM pest_infestation_data WHERE infestation_date < '2021-06-01'
SELECT * FROM PestInfestationData;
SELECT id, date, pest_type FROM PestInfestationData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PestControlMeasures WHERE effectiveness = 'High';
SELECT id, control_method FROM PestControlMeasures ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, date, pest_type, infestation_level FROM PestInfestationData WHERE infestation_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM PestInfestationData WHERE pest_type = 'Cockroach' ORDER BY date DESC, infestation_level ASC;
SELECT id, pest_type FROM PestInfestationData WHERE infestation_level > 3;
SELECT id, date, pest_type, infestation_level FROM PestControlMeasures WHERE effectiveness = 'High' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, control_method, effectiveness FROM PestControlMeasures WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT p.date, p.pest_type, c.control_method FROM PestInfestationData p JOIN PestControlMeasures c ON p.id = c.id WHERE p.infestation_level >= 5 ORDER BY p.date ASC;
SELECT * FROM PestInfestationData;
SELECT pest_type, infestation_level FROM PestInfestationData;
SELECT pest_type, infestation_level FROM PestInfestationData WHERE infestation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT pest_type, infestation_level, infestation_date FROM PestInfestationData ORDER BY infestation_level DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_notes FROM InfestationReports WHERE pest_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM PestInfestationData;
SELECT pest_type, infestation_level FROM PestInfestationData ORDER BY infestation_date DESC;
SELECT control_type, control_date, control_method FROM PestControlMeasures WHERE control_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT pr.report_id, pid.pest_type, pcm.control_type FROM InfestationReports AS pr JOIN PestInfestationData AS pid ON pr.pest_id = pid.pest_id JOIN PestControlMeasures AS pcm ON pr.control_id = pcm.control_id;
SELECT * FROM InfestationReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM pests;
SELECT name, location FROM pests WHERE infestation_level > 3;
SELECT method_name, cost FROM pest_control_methods WHERE effectiveness_rating > 5;
SELECT report_date, report_details FROM infestation_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT name, expertise_area, phone_number FROM pest_control_specialists WHERE expertise_area = 'Rodent Control';
SELECT name, infestation_level FROM pests WHERE location = 'Kitchen' ORDER BY infestation_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM pest_control_methods WHERE cost < 500 ORDER BY effectiveness_rating ASC;
SELECT p.name AS pest_name, m.method_name AS method_name, r.report_date FROM pests p JOIN infestation_reports r ON p.id = r.pest_id JOIN pest_control_methods m ON r.method_id = m.id;
SELECT name, expertise_area, phone_number FROM pest_control_specialists WHERE expertise_area = 'Rodent Control';
SELECT * FROM pests WHERE infestation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-08-31';
SELECT * FROM pests;
SELECT pest_id, pest_name, pest_type FROM pests ORDER BY pest_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM infestation_sites WHERE site_location='Garden';
SELECT site_name, site_description FROM infestation_sites WHERE site_location='Kitchen' ORDER BY site_name;
SELECT pest_name, pest_type, pest_description FROM pests WHERE pest_id=3;
SELECT * FROM pests;
SELECT pest_name, pest_type FROM pests ORDER BY pest_name DESC;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM infestation_sites WHERE site_location='Indoors';
SELECT record_id, infestation_date, infestation_level FROM infestation_records ORDER BY infestation_date DESC, infestation_level ASC;
SELECT measure_name, measure_type, measure_description FROM pest_control_measures WHERE measure_type='Chemical';
